remarks: The property of an unordered pair to be an alternatively defined undirected simple graph without loops (defined as a pair (V,E) of a set V (vertex set) and a set of unordered pairs of elements of V (edge set).  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 28-Aug-2017.)
statement:
ausgra.1 $e |- G = { <. v , e >. | e C_ { x e. ~P v | ( # ` x ) = 2 } } $.
isausgra $p |- ( ( V e. W /\ E e. X ) -> ( V G E <-> E C_ { x e. ~P V | ( # ` x ) = 2 } ) ) $.
$d E e v x $.
$d V e v x $.
$d X x $.
